attributes.action: Prevent British Energy from coming under foreign control
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
EDF (a French company)is buying British Energy and taking-over existing British nuclear power stations and proposing to build more such power stations.
This will allow the French to control even more of our utilities and alow them even more political leverage in our affairs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
